Class WriterCal

java.lang.Object
  WriterCal

public class WriterCal
extends java.lang.Object

This class wil be used to write another class which will be used to complete the calculation. The purpose of using another class to make a calculation is to enhance the versatility of the calculator, thus allowing for longer formulas. Plus, it just looks cool. And I'd like to know how to use the stuff I've read from my Java manual.

1 - Created 20150315

BENNETTE
